name: product_intro
description: Product introduction email template with hero image, pricing, feature highlights, CTA buttons, and social links. Features gradient backgrounds and responsive design optimized for email clients.

samples.feature_1_description: Send money instantly with ultra-fast processing.
samples.feature_3_description:
See your spending
in vibrant dashboards.

fieldPrompt.hero_image_url: Enter URL for the hero/banner image
fieldPrompt.download_app: Enter the download app button (label and URL)
fieldPrompt.contact_button: Enter the contact button (label and URL)
fieldPrompt.footer_link_1_text: Enter the first footer link text
fieldPrompt.footer_link_1_url: Enter the first footer link URL (optional)
fieldPrompt.footer_link_2_text: Enter the second footer link text
fieldPrompt.footer_link_2_url: Enter the second footer link URL (optional)
fieldPrompt.footer_link_3_text: Enter the third footer link text
fieldPrompt.footer_link_3_url: Enter the third footer link URL (optional)
fieldPrompt.social_icon_1: Enter the first social media icon (icon URL and link)
fieldPrompt.social_icon_2: Enter the second social media icon (icon URL and link)
fieldPrompt.social_icon_3: Enter the third social media icon (icon URL and link)
fieldPrompt.social_icon_4: Enter the fourth social media icon (icon URL and link)
fieldPrompt.primary_color: Enter the primary brand color (hex, e.g., #3d6ee0)
fieldPrompt.gradient_start_color: Enter the gradient start color (hex, e.g., #3d6ee0)
fieldPrompt.gradient_end_color: Enter the gradient end color (hex, e.g., #c59dff)
fieldPrompt.custom_css: Optional: Enter custom CSS to override/extend default styles
fieldPrompt.custom_html: Optional: Enter custom HTML to replace the default template structure
